format: This data frame contains the following columns:

parameters.id: a numeric vector for subject id
parameters.smoke:
an indicator of maternal smoking at the first
year of the study
parameters.age: a numeric vector of age, 0 is 9 years old

description:
Description
The ohio data frame has 2148 rows and 4 columns. The dataset is a
subset of the six-city study, a longitudinal study of the health effects of
air pollution.
title: Ohio Children Wheeze Status
